full_summary:
**MFT Gateway or Equivalent for Canadian Space Agency**

**Reference Number:** SSC-24-00027064:T
**Solicitation Number:** BPM021796/27064
**Publication Date:** July 23, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** August 8, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

**Procurement Overview:**
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a contractor to provide a MFT (Multi-Factor Authentication Technology) Gateway or Equivalent for the Canadian Space Agency.

**Key Elements:**

* The successful bidder will be responsible for providing a MFT Gateway or equivalent solution that meets the requirements of the Canadian Space Agency.
* The solution must be capable of providing a secure and reliable connection to the agency's systems.
* The bidder must have experience in delivering MFT Gateway or equivalent solutions to government agencies or large enterprises.
* The bidder must be capable of providing a comprehensive solution that includes:
	+ Implementation and configuration of the MFT Gateway or equivalent
	+ Security and maintenance of the solution
	+ Support and training for the users
* The bidder must have a team with expertise in MFT technology and security.

**Eligibility:**
Any company that specializes in providing MFT Gateway or equivalent solutions to government agencies or large enterprises is eligible to participate.

**Constants:**

* The MFT Gateway or equivalent solution must meet the requirements of the government.

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or clarifications regarding this RFP, contact:
Chantal Deland, SSC
Phone: 343-551-7304
Email: [chantal.deland@canada.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@canada.ca)
Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa ON K2P 2N1.

**Attachments:**
Available at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/3D0D5E1E-4098-4676-AAD4-321647D4615B](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/3D0D5E1E-4098-4676-AAD4-321647D4615B) and [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/F0FB0436-8354-47C0-B015-54F11612DBDB](https://ss
